thread.title: Bercovici's 5 TD passes lead Sun Devils over Buffaloes 48-23
thread.title_full: Bercovici's 5 TD passes lead Sun Devils over Buffaloes 48-23

title: Bercovici's 5 TD passes lead Sun Devils over Buffaloes 48-23
text:
Bercovici's 5 TD passes lead Sun Devils over Buffaloes 48-23 AP Oct 11, 2015 at 1:43a ET 0Shares 
TEMPE, Ariz. (AP) Mike Bercovici threw five touchdown passes, tying a career high, and Tim White caught two scores to lead Arizona State to a 48-23 win over Colorado Saturday night in a Pac-12 South Division game. 
Bercovici completed 20 of 31 passes for 260 yards and threw an interception before giving way to Manny Wilkins with 8:31 left in the game. One of Bercovici's scores came off a deflected ball that landed in White's hands and went 45 yards. 
ASU (4-2, 2-1) won its second straight conference game on the heels of a 38-23 upset of then-No. 7 UCLA last week. 
The Buffaloes (3-3, 0-2) lost their 13th straight conference road game, stretching back to the 2012 season, and are 0-7 all-time against the Sun Devils . 0
